About Me

Hi I am Anay Modi :wave:,
am a CS student at the University of Michigan who is passionate about technology, travel, sports, movies, dance, music, and more! I always want to try new things, whether that means using a new Python library or eating fried ice cream for the first time. Feel free to contact me at anaym@umich.edu if you ever want to chat or try something new together!

Student, University of Michigan CS

August 2022 — May 2025

Current student at the U of Michigan's College of Engineering studying Computer Science with a Math Minor. On campus, I am a member of the Michigan Data Science Team & Atlas Consulting Group!

Technology Intern, University of Michigan

May 2023 — August 2023

Worked at the university's Shared Services Center, which powers many of the school's financial and administrative logistics behind the scenes. I worked to create and publish new APIs in the university's API directory, as well develop automation solutions using scripting languages, external APIs, and third-party applications.
